sourcesContent:
import React from "react"; const AppointMentDetailModal = ({ show, onClose, patient }) => { if (!show || !patient) return null; return (

Appointment Details

{patient.name}

Age:

{patient.age} year old

Date:

{new Date(patient.date).toLocaleDateString("en-CA")}

Gender:

{patient.user.gender}

Time:

{patient.time}

Disease:

{patient.doctor.department}

Doctor:

{patient.doctor.firstName}

); }; export default AppointMentDetailModal;
